title: [Large-Scale] Science-Based Action Learning Lifelong Education Through Workplace and Community Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in scientific disciplines and foundational project management competencies
context.additional_context: Course for medical/legal/technical professionals to apply scientific approaches to community problem-solving, operated in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, with project work linked to real workplace issues.

learning_goals: Learners can apply scientific methodologies to the action learning process to derive actionable solutions for community problem-solving.
Learners can systematically document project progress and perform performance analysis using narrative-based learning tools.
Learners can evaluate the linkage between individual performance and organizational development through peer feedback and mentoring.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
